metadata.title: CVE-2023-2731 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in Libtiff's LZWDecode() functionin the libtiff/tif_lzw.c file. This flaw allows a local attacker to craftspecific input data that can cause the program to dereference a NULLpointer when decompressing a TIFF format file, resulting in a program crashor denial of service.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
